clean_data: DevOps Engineer DevOps Engineer DevOps Engineer ArborMetrix Work Experience DevOps Engineer ArborMetrix October 2018 to Present Current Employer please do not contact Assisted the organization in moving from Vmware to AWS during the transformation from a startup to an Enterprise Dockerized main application in tomcat and deploying with Kurbernetes Designed and implemented a multiVPC infrastructure in AWS utilizing multiple AWS resources such as EC2 S3 EFS EBS EKSFor kubernetes deployments IAMincluded RBAC authentication with kubernetes through IAM Including Properly designing secure and scalable infrastructure with the use of Terraform DevOps Contractor DewPoint Inc August 2017 to October 2018 with Delta Dental of Michigan Built and deployed Enterprise CMS environment for the launch of their Single Shopper core application Created a Selfserver VMware stack for developers to build and deploy code in a CICD manner allowing them to reset a standard static VMware infrastructure Created 3 separate environments for Test UAT and Production Utilized SaltStack to automate server configurations Utilized Jenkins to create pipelines and seamless code deploys with BitBucket as our SCM Assisted in the designing and implementation of an Enterprise Openstack environment for DDMI utilizing the Canonicals offering of Openstack Produced automation scripts for serverside provisioning of hardware up to the provisioning of the base applications with SaltStack Created automated deployments for multiple environments including serverside builds deployment of Java based applications and provisioning of Tomcat instances LinuxInfrastructure and Automation Administrator Spectrum Net Designs September 2016 to July 2017 Scaled the frontend web servers running CentOS and Nginx to handle multiple sites and more traffic Configured VMware to properly handle resources adding hosts updating ESXi on all host Developed a storage efficient disaster recovery plan that included S3 integration with backups and automated rebuilding of all VMs through the use of Ansible Migrated multiple Windows server versions 2000 2003 and 2007 to Linux to manage DNS firewall and SAN aspects instead of being on windows Built a new colocation for redundancy at Switch Data center which included configuring Cisco switches for 2 DMZ and an internal network installed and configured new dell Equalogic to be SAN optimized for high write environment Support Systems Administrator and Spam Threat Protection Greenview Data Inc January 2015 to August 2016 Systems AdministratorSpam Analysis Wrote extensive regex filters in Perl and bash to combat Spam from a multiltude of sources Worked exclusively with a RedHat based environment that was managed in houseVMWare and in AWS Managed 45 individual mail and spam analysis clusters that form the entire spam and email hosting network across 4 continents Managed IpTables based firewalls performed routine Redhat server maintenance provided constant configuration update and management within the postfixsendmail mail and spam filtering system Available for Weekend Evening Shifts also Able to Relocate Nationwide Education High school or equivalent Skills Linux Devops AWS Jenkins
entities: Test UAT and Production Utilized SaltStack
Spam Threat Protection Greenview Data Inc
